title: data attributes
description: 'node' contains the internal description of the nodes by the vis.js library as well as some properties that help remember and propagate the meaning of the node in TAPIS

label.description: The label that acompanies the node shape

image.description: Path to the image shown inside the shape

STAURL.description: URL of the service or file represented as a table. Includes de path and query parameters

STAEntityName.description: Last name of the entity in the path or expanded. Defines the scope of the node query parameters

authorization.description: 'authorization' header parameter to be used in the EDC

S3.description: Security parameters to be used in the S3 and MinIO

STAResourceId.description: Text representing the Id of a selected resource (e.g. in SelectRow or SelectResource)

STASelectExpandNextOrigin.description: Points to the the recursive STASelectedExpands expanded entity that is the focus of the node query parameters. If empty, points to the root of STASelectedExpands

barPlotOptions.description: Saves the configuration of a bar chart or pie graphic for the functions DrawBarPlot() and ShowBarPlotDialog()

axisX.description: Name of the field that provides the category names for pie and bar charts

series.description: Name of the field that provides the subclassification for the stacked bar charts

axisY.description: Name of the field that provides the values for pie and bar charts

labelY.description: Text for the description of the axis Y for bar charts

groupByParams.description: Saves the configuration of a groupBy for the functions GetGroupBy() and TBD()

groupByAttr.description: Array of column names that should have the same value to group

aggregationAttr.description: Column names and the aggregation method

STAtimeOut.description: Javascript TimeOut handle for the subscriptions to update data

STAOneValue.description: Saves the configuration of the OneValue box

variable.description: Name of the collumn that contains the variable value to represent

timeVariable.description: Name of the collumn that contains the time to the value to represent

redrawPeriod.description: Number of seconds to refresh the value

alertValue.description: If the variable value is above this numerial value, the text and the node are represented in red

skip.description: Number of entities to skip in the response. Default is 0

top.description: Number of entities to include in the response. Default is 100

orderBy.description: Criteria to sort the entities in the response

attribute.description: Name of the attribute that is used to sort the data

desc.description: Way to sort the data. true mean descending. false mean ascending

selected.description: Attributes selected to be included in the returned entities. If missing, all attributes are included. The implementation also supports an object with additionalProperties that are booleans for historical reasons.

additionalProperties.description: Name of the entity to be expanded as a JSON object in the response
